languages.text: "Гордо гремит имя стаи Зловещий вой! Хвала Всеотцу, что послал нам столь грозных и доблестных братьев!" {n}Торбальд делает жест, и Хальбрандт снимает с пояса великолепный топор, чтобы с почтительным поклоном поднести его Ульфару.{/n} "Прими от Грозовых укусов сей дар в память о битве, что прошли плечом к плечу".

"Proudly thunders the Baleful Howl! Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."
languages.original_text: "Гордо гремит имя стаи Зловещий вой! Хвала Всеотцу, что послал нам столь грозных и доблестных братьев!" {n}Торбальд делает жест, и Хальбрандт снимает с пояса великолепный топор, чтобы с почтительным поклоном поднести его Ульфару.{/n} "Прими от Грозовых укусов сей дар в память о битве, что прошли плечом к плечу".

Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."

Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."

traits.locale_text: "Proudly thunders the Baleful Howl! Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «¡Que el nombre del Aullido Torvo resuene orgulloso! ¡Alabado sea el Padre de todas las cosas por enviarnos a unos hermanos tan formidables y valerosos!». {n}Thorbald hace un gesto y Halbrandt se quita un hacha magnífica del cinturón, entregándosela a Ulfar con una reverencia.{/n} «Acepta este regalo de los Muerdetormentas en honor de la batalla que hemos librado codo con codo».
languages.original_text: "Proudly thunders the Baleful Howl! Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."

traits.locale_text: «¡Que el nombre de la jauría de los Hambrientos de fama resuene orgulloso! ¡Alabado sea el Padre de todas las cosas por enviarnos a unos hermanos tan formidables y valerosos!». {n}Thorbald hace un gesto y Halbrandt se quita un hacha magnífica del cinturón, entregándosela a Ulfar con una reverencia.{/n} «Acepta este regalo de los Muerdetormentas en honor de la batalla que hemos librado codo con codo».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “怒嚎者狼群的咆哮响彻战场！赞美全父，赐予我们如此强大英勇的兄弟！”{n}索巴德做了个手势。哈尔布兰特从腰带上取下一把华丽的斧头，恭敬地鞠躬呈给乌尔法。{/n}“请接受噬风者的这份礼物，纪念这场光荣的并肩作战。”
languages.original_text: "Proudly thunders the Baleful Howl! Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."

traits.locale_text: “骄傲地呼唤渴名者狼群吧！赞美全父，赐予我们如此强大英勇的兄弟！”{n}索巴德做了个手势。哈尔布兰特从腰带上取下一把华丽的斧头，恭敬地鞠躬呈给乌尔法。{/n}“请接受噬风者的这份礼物，纪念这场光荣的并肩作战。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「破滅の咆哮の名を誇りとともに轟かせよ！このような手強く勇敢な兄弟を私たちに送ってくださった全知の父を讃えるのだ！」{n}トールバルドが身振りで示すと、ハルブラントはベルトから立派な斧を外し、恭しくお辞儀をしながらウルファーに差し出した。 {/n}「肩を並べて戦った栄光を称えて、嵐喰いからのこの贈り物をお受け取りください」
languages.original_text: "Proudly thunders the Baleful Howl! Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."

traits.locale_text: 「破滅の咆哮の名を誇りとともに轟かせよ！このような手強く勇敢な兄弟を私たちに送ってくださった全知の父を讃えるのだ！」{n}トールバルドが身振りで示すと、ハルブラントはベルトから立派な斧を外し、恭しくお辞儀をしながらウルファーに差し出した。 {/n}「肩を並べて戦った栄光を称えて、嵐喰いからのこの贈り物をお受け取りください」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Que tonne fièrement le nom de la meute des Hurleurs sanguinaires ! Loué soit le Père de Tous pour nous avoir adjoint des frères aussi vaillants que redoutables ! » {n}Sur un geste de Thorbald, Halbrandt sort une hache majestueuse de sa ceinture et l'offre à Ulfar avec une profonde révérence.{/n} « Acceptez ce présent des Crocs de la tempête en l'honneur de la bataille que nous avons livrée côte à côte. »
languages.original_text: "Proudly thunders the Baleful Howl! Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."

traits.locale_text: « Que tonne fièrement le nom de la meute des Dévoreurs de gloire ! Loué soit le Père de Tous pour nous avoir adjoint des frères aussi vaillants que redoutables ! » {n}Sur un geste de Thorbald, Halbrandt sort une hache majestueuse de sa ceinture et l'offre à Ulfar avec une profonde révérence.{/n} « Acceptez ce présent des Crocs de la tempête en l'honneur de la bataille que nous avons livrée côte à côte. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Stolz donnert das Baleful Howl! Gepriesen sei der Allvater, dass er uns solch formidable und tapfere Brüder geschickt hat!" {n}Thorbald führt eine Geste aus, und Halbrandt zieht eine prächtige Axt aus seinem Gürtel und überreicht sie Ulfar mit einer ehrerbietigen Verbeugung.{/n} "Akzeptiert von den Stormbiters dieses Geschenk zu Ehren der Schlacht, die Schulter an Schulter ausgetragen wurde."
languages.original_text: "Proudly thunders the Baleful Howl! Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."

traits.locale_text: "Stolz donnert der Name des Famehungry-Rudels! Gepriesen sei der Allvater, dass er uns solch formidable und tapfere Brüder geschickt hat!" {n}Thorbald führt eine Gaste aus, und Halbrandt zieht eine prächtige Axt aus seinem Gürtel und überreicht sie Ulfar mit einer ehrerbietigen Verneugung.{/n} "Akzeptiert von den Stormbiters dieses Geschenk zu Ehren der Schlacht, die Schulter an Schulter ausgetragen wurde."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Uğursuz Uluma gururla kükrüyor! Bizlere böyle korkusuz ve yiğit kardeşler bahşettiği için Yücebaba'ya şükürler olsun!" {n}Thorbald işaret edince Halbrandt, kemerinden harika bir balta çıkarıyor ve önünde saygıyla eğilerek Ulfar'a sunuyor.{/n} "Omuz omuza dövüşülen savaşın şerefine Borayutanların bu hediyesini kabul eyle."
languages.original_text: "Proudly thunders the Baleful Howl! Praise the Allfather for sending us such formidable and valiant brothers!" {n}Thorbald makes a gesture, and Halbrandt removes a magnificent axe from his belt, presenting it to Ulfar with a deferential bow.{/n} "Accept from the Stormbiters this gift in honour of the battle that was fought shoulder to shoulder."

traits.locale_text: "Uğursuz Uluma gururla kükrüyor! Bizlere böyle korkusuz ve yiğit kardeşler bahşettiği için Yücebaba'ya şükürler olsun!" {n}Thorbald işaret edince Halbrandt, kemerinden harika bir baltayı çıkarıyor ve önünde saygıyla eğilerek Ulfar'a baltayı veriyor.{/n} "Omuz omuza dövüşülen savaşın şerefine Borayutanların bu hediyesini kabul et."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
